ModMetaData.name: RimFantasy - Arcane Batons
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.1[/h1] [h1][i]Caution: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2553700067]Medieval Overhaul[/url] users should consider using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2836791007]RimFantasy - Medieval Overhaul Edition[/url] instead of this mod.[/i][/h1]
This mod adds 7 magical batons that holds a small amount of magical energy.
These batons are infused with magic and have a chance to stun enemies on hit, they designed for utility purposes in mind but are also handy in survival situations where no alternatives are available.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]7 Utility batons, each with its unique quirks [*]1 Workbench [*]2 Researches [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630669656]RimFantasy - Gemstones[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630670287]RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2632845986]RimFantasy - Crystallic Lighting[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Arcane Weapons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Arcane Weapons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url] [/list]
[b]Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]Save Game Compatible [*]Will not play nice with other gemstone mods without a patch. [/list]
